content.question: Which of the following lists chemical species in order from largest to smallest radius?

choices.label: <math alttext="S with a negative 2 charge is greater than O, which is greater than F" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>-</mo></mrow></msup><mo>></mo><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mo>></mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></math>

<math alttext="O is greater than O with a negative 2 charge, which is greater than N e" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mo>></mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>-</mo></mrow></msup><mo>></mo><mi>Ne</mi></math>

<math alttext="K with a positive 1 charge is greater than A r, which is greater than C l" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">K</mi><mo>+</mo></msup><mo>></mo><mi>Ar</mi><mo>></mo><mi>Cl</mi></math>

<math alttext="N a is greater than M g with a positive 2 charge, which is greater than M g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>Na</mi><mo>></mo><msup><mi>Mg</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup><mo>></mo><mi>Mg</mi></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="S with a negative 2 charge is greater than O, which is greater than F" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>-</mo></mrow></msup><mo>></mo><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mo>></mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></math>

skill.text: 1.A: Describe the components of and quantitative information from models and representations that illustrate particulate-level properties only.
